attributes.background:
23 year old Suriya Bi was a teaching Assistant at the Heartlands Academy in Birimingham. She has been sacked for objecting to a class of 11-year-olds being shown graphic footage of 9/11.

The video has a rating for people aged 18 and over.

rejection.details:
This petition has been rejected because it is about an issue that the UK Government and Parliament are not responsible. 

The appointment of staff to a school is a matter for the school itself and you may wish to write to the school's governors about this matter.
